transArray.content:
Service: Every employee in the hotel has very good service. They are all enthusiastic and professional. When they see that we have a lot of luggage, they will take the initiative to help us carry our luggage. They also thoughtfully connected the elderly's mobile phones to wireless connections.
Hygiene: The hygiene is very clean. The floor in the room is very clean. The sheets are very comfortable to sleep on. The transparent mouthwash cup is also very bright.
Environment: The environment is very good. As soon as you enter the lobby, there is lemon scent, which smells very good. The food delivery robot is very cute.
Dear guest, thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to share your stay experience. You are a little man with a gentleness that is concealed by your publicity. I love you.
